title: JEWBILEE
text: The Broflovski house. Gerald and Sheila are with Ike at his changing table in his room.

text: (Kyle, I'm gonna camp and watch the meteor shower. Do you wanna come and see it with me?)

title: JEWBILEE
text: (What's that?)

text: It's what we do in Jew Scouts. Usually we just sit around and make stuff. But tonight, because there's a meteor shower, we're gonna do some big thing out in the woods. It's gonna suck ass, I'm sure.

text: You see boys, Jew Scouts is a special group that borrows a little bit from all different Jewish denominations. From the Orthodox Jews, from the Hasidic Jews, from the Northern Italy Cave Jews... But you have to believe the basic tenets of Judaism to be a Scout.

text: It's the Squirts.

title: JEWBILEE
text: Go, Ike!

title: JEWBILEE
text: Unlock the door, Squirts! The keys are up there.

title: JEWBILEE
text: They'll never reach.

title: JEWBILEE
text: Squirts, fall in. Chinese formation.

title: JEWBILEE
text: The woods. Elder Garth catches up to Kenny

title: JEWBILEE
text: Give me that book!

title: JEWBILEE
text: (Ow!)

title: JEWBILEE
text: Haman will deal with you!

title: JEWBILEE
text: (Ow!)

title: JEWBILEE
text: The camp. The Squirts have finished the pillar, with Ike at the very top. Ike gets the key and the pillar falls apart to form two rows of four Squirts each, and Ike alone at the top of the steps. He jumps up to the padlock and unlocks it. He then removes the lock. The door opens and everyone inside pours out. Elder Harris moves out into the open

title: JEWBILEE
text: Oh, no. It's too late!

title: JEWBILEE
text: Ramek shtud!

title: JEWBILEE
text: What is that?

title: JEWBILEE
text: It is Haman.

title: JEWBILEE
text: Yes! Yes!

title: JEWBILEE
text: Free! Free to punish those that imprisoned me!

title: JEWBILEE
text: Haman! It's me, Garth! I freed you!

title: JEWBILEE
text: Look!

title: JEWBILEE
text: (It's okay, I'll use my head!)

title: JEWBILEE
text: Kenny! Noooooo!

title: JEWBILEE
text: (Heeeeeyah! Ugh!)

title: JEWBILEE
text: Moses! Nooo!

title: JEWBILEE
text: Nooo! Eheh. Nooo!  Moses. Uh I, I apologize for any inconvenience, eheh. Uh yuh you see, I was just uh-

title: JEWBILEE
text: Die!

title: JEWBILEE
text: No! Aaaaaah! Ooww!

title: JEWBILEE
text: Hooray!

title: JEWBILEE
text: Kenny!

title: JEWBILEE
text: That blow to his head must have killed him.

title: JEWBILEE
text: He saved us. He saved all the Jews.

title: JEWBILEE
text: You know, I think we all learned something today. It's fine to have your own beliefs and your own traditions, but as soon as you start excluding people from your ways, only because of their race, you become separatists. And being a separatist sucks ass.

title: JEWBILEE
text: We've learned a lot from you and your great friend, Kenny.

title: JEWBILEE
text: Every year we shall gather here in this special place and bring Kenny tidings of soap sculptures and macaroni pictures.

title: JEWBILEE
text: Yes.

title: JEWBILEE
text: And those little shaker things where... you put beans inside of paper plates that are glued together.

title: JEWBILEE
text: Paper-plate bean shakers.

title: JEWBILEE
text: And let us put patterns of glue on the outside of those paper plates so we can then pour glitter on them so they can look nice and sparkly.

title: JEWBILEE
text: You heard him, Scouts! Let's get to work!
